headline: Andrea's Pasta Fagioli
name: Andrea's Pasta Fagioli
description: This pasta fagioli recipe features tomato sauce, cannellini beans, navy beans, and ditalini pasta with parsley, basil, and oregano for a chunky soup.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Cook and stir onion in hot oil until translucent. Stir in garlic and cook until tender. Reduce heat and stir in water, tomato sauce, cannellini beans, navy beans, Parmesan, parsley, basil, oregano, and salt. Simmer for 1 hour.
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook pasta in boiling water until tender yet firm to the bite, 8 to 10 minutes; drain. Stir into soup.
